Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Vlakfontein_Coal_Mine. Vlakfontein Coal Mine is a surface mine located in Witbank, Mpumalanga, South Africa

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is state-owned and supplies coal to the Kendal Power Station run by Eskom.
